overview: Smoothed down, edges rounded and buffed up. The clean cut guys from the Chizzeled workshop are well trained, highly skilled and crazily over sexed. It's a small crew and the workshop is often empty, the smell of fresh cut wood lingers in the air, soft sawdust underfoot and dealing with solid materials all day does something to the very hard workers making them insatiable. Fucking on the workbench, shagged over the bandsaw and pumped up against the heavy press, no area or piece of equipment is safe.
title: Chizzeled
